Let me start off by saying that I never write reviews…that’s how great these shirts are. I’ve pretty much bought them in every color at this point. They are a great basic to throw on with a pair of work out pants to run errands or to wear as a laying piece. They can also be dressed up with a pair of jeans or skirt. The material is soft and comfortable/breathable. It’s double layer so it’s supportive and you can wear with or without a bra- I have a larger chest and there’s not many shirts I’ll wear without a bra and still feel supported but this is one. It’s true to size. I am a size large in tops and bought the large- they are meant to be snug so if you want a looser fit size up. Also like that they are not crop! Colors are great, price is great and you should go buy them now.

评论详情: Was looking for a pink top and bought 3 from this company. Planning on wearing with pink combat boots I have and jeans or a black short skirt. Can’t beat the prices!

I am already a fan of this brand and have another top from them that I absolutely love! This one is super cute, and the buttery soft material feels amazing. However, they added a half undershirt inside (definitely not a bra, because it’s not holding anything down). I’m a 36D, and while the top itself is comfy and stretchy, the undershirt doesn’t fit over my chest properly. I tried it with a bra, but it just made things more awkward. If you’re smaller-chested, this top would probably work great for you. For me, the little underlayer is too short to comfortably cover my chest, so it ends up feeling uncomfy. That said, the material and overall stretch are still fantastic! I’m returning them all :(
